Spice rackpack

Spice rackpack
Rarity:
Type: Loot
Slot: Back
Value: 84
Search
Keyword: 		Cooking
Properties:
Bankable:     Droppable:
Sellable:     Tradable:

A widespread Wrentmarkeen invention - a backpack where you can stove rows of spice packs.

The Spice rackpack item is a loot item.

Requirement

  • At least Cooking lvl. 62.

Attributes

+5% Work efficiency While doing Cooking.
+10 Inventory space While doing Cooking.

Uses

This item may be equipped to your character.

Sources

Shop Purchases

Shop Name Location Region Item Type Stock Price
Southern Gem Myriadian Arc Wrentmark 1 12,500
